text: The 2012 Men's Olympic Football Tournament was the under-23 football tournament. It was held during the 2012 Summer Olympics. It was held from 26 July to 11 August. All the national under-23 qualified football teams can compete. The defending champion was Argentina. The tournament was hosted in England (4 stadiums), Scotland (1 stadium) and Wales (1 stadium). 16 teams were qualified for the final group stage. ==Teams== Means of qualification Date of completion Venue Berths Qualified Host nation — 1 AFC Preliminary Competition 29 March 2012 Various (home and away) 3 CAF Preliminary Competition 10 December 2011 3 CONCACAF Preliminary Competition 2 April 2012 2 CONMEBOL Preliminary Competition 12 February 2011 2 OFC Preliminary Competition 25 March 2012 1 UEFA Preliminary Competition 25 June 2011 3 AFC–CAF play-off 23 April 2012 Great Britain 1 Total 16
